credit_line: Gift of Mrs. Charles T. Cook
dimensions:
Overall: 9 x 1 1/8 in. (22.9 x 2.9 cm)
rim: 7/8 in. (2.3 cm)
title: Fusiform Unguentarium
description: Natural light-green, thin, transparent glass. Long tubular body with a biconical bulge at center; one side of bulge is flattened. Small, irregular, flattened rim folded inward. Rounded thick base widens slightly. Pontil-mark. Light iridescent film, some creamy weathering. Partially full of unanalyzed matter.
